channel.title: My title EXUVIAE is now being sold in a bricks and mortar store!
channel.description:
Forgive the gushing, but I am pleased that a networking gambit paid off.
Today being Free RPG Day, I was running some Cthulhu Dark in North London, largely so I could start up a good dialogue with the rpg buyer.
Suffice to say, Leisure Games in Finchley now stocks [**EXUVIAE**](gum.co/exuviae) and I'm very pleased to soon be shelved alongside **The Clay that Woke**, **Dream Apart / Dream Askew**, and **Durance**.

item.title: My title EXUVIAE is now being sold in a bricks and mortar store!
item.dc:creator: @seanFsmith
item.description:
@seanFsmith wrote:

Even better, they have sold out within two weeks and reordered four copies! I am more than terribly happy about this

Read full topic
item.source: My title EXUVIAE is now being sold in a bricks and mortar store!
